LanguageData.HAR.HairOneInfo: This color is determined by the standard Hair color. Change the colonist's normal hair color to change this color.
LanguageData.HAR.StartingRaceDescription: Restrict randomization to a specific alien race.
LanguageData.HAR.Options.TextureLoadingLogs_Tooltip: True: Texture loading logs are displayed on startup.\nFalse: Texture loading logs and details are suppressed.\nNote: This is intended for race mod debugging and development.
LanguageData.HAR.Options.RandomizeStartingPawns_Toolt: True: Randomizing a starting pawn will allow for a complete reroll.\nFalse: All Settings stay on a reroll and only details will change.
LanguageData.HAR.StartingHumanlikesScenPart.Label: Starting with Humanlikes
